message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the product is intriguing, $14,000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand that $14,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is my final offer, as I'm happy to purchase from John for $10,000 if we can't come to an agreement.
I'm not willing to go as low as $11,500, but I'm willing to compromise further. I'll meet you at $12,200. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower
